bill.title: Income tax; remove repeal date on tax credit for certain charges for using certain port facilities and airports.
bill.description: An Act To Reenact And Amend Sections 27-7-22.7 And 27-7-22.9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide An Income Tax Credit For Certain Taxpayers That Use Port Facilities At State, County And Municipal Ports For The Export Of Cargo And Require The Mississippi Development Authority To Report Annually To The Legislature Regarding The Impact Of Such Tax Credit; To Repeal Section 4, Chapter 492, Laws Of 1994, As Last Amended By Section 3, Chapter 322, Laws Of 2009, Which Repeals Sections 27-7-22.7 And 27-7-22.9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, On December 31, 2012; To Reenact And Amend Sections 27-7-22.25 And 27-7-22.26, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide An Income Tax Credit For Certain Taxpayers That Use The Airport Facilities At Public Airports For Certain Charges Paid By The Taxpayer On The Export Or Import Of Cargo And Require The Mississippi Development Authority To Report Annually To The Legislature Regarding The Impact Of Such Tax Credit; To Repeal Section 3, Chapter 442, Laws Of 2005, As Last Amended By Section 3, Chapter 323, Laws Of 2009, Which Repeals Sections 27-7-22.25 And 27-7-22.26, Mississippi Code Of 1972, On July 1, 2012; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Title Suff Do Pass As Amended
